name: TIMEOUT_ANSWERS_2
description: This table stores the answers to the timeout questions.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the timeout record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ISOLATN_STAT_REVD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the isolation status of the patient was reviewed prior to surgery.

columns.name: PARALYSIS_NEEDED_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if any paralytic drugs will be used during the surgery.

columns.name: BLD_GLUCOSE_REVD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient's blood glucose was reviewed prior to surgery.

columns.name: VENT_NEEDED_POST_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if a ventilator will be needed for the patient after the surgery.

columns.name: POSTOP_PAIN_PLAN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the plans for post-op pain management were made and reviewed prior to surgery.

columns.name: WOUND_CLASS_CONF_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether or not wound classification was confirmed during the timeout.

columns.name: WARM_MEAS_ADDRD_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether or not warming measures were addressed during the timeout.

columns.name: DIABET_STAT_ADDRD_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether or not the patient's diabetic status has been addressed during the timeout.

columns.name: IMPLANT_SIZE_VER_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether implant sizes were confirmed for this procedure.

columns.name: PAT_LABELS_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient labels were available for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_NPO_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the Nothing by Mouth (NPO) status was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_INR_VALUE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the International Normalized Ratio (INR) value was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_APTT_VALUE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (APTT) value was reviewed for a timeout

columns.name: REV_PAT_ANTIDIAB_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient's use of antidiabetics was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_PAT_ANTIDIUR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient's use of antidiuretics was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_PAT_COAG_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient's coagulation status was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: DOC_OBJ_INT_LEFT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if objects intentionally left in patient were documented for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_OBJ_INT_LEFT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if objects intentionally left in patient were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_IV_THER_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the intravenous (IV) therapy instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_PAIN_MED_INST_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the pain medication instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_MED_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the medication instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_VENT_OX_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the ventilation/oxygenation instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_POSTOP_ASSMNT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the post-operative assessment instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_LDA_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the Lines, Drains, and Airways (LDA) instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_DIET_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the dietary instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_LIQD_IN_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the liquid intake instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_WND_CRE_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the wound care instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_FOL_UP_PLAN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the follow-up plan was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: DISCHRG_SUM_WRTTN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the discharge summary was written for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_DISCHRG_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the discharge instructions were reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_TRANSFER_FORM_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the transfer form was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_PAT_HOME_MEDS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient's use of home medications was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: REV_PAT_PROB_LIST_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient's problem list was reviewed for a timeout.

columns.name: IMMUNOSUPR_ORDER_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether immunosuppressants were ordered and given to the patient for this procedure.

columns.name: SURGICAL_ATTIRE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether everyone is wearing appropriate surgical attire for this procedure.

columns.name: PAT_ORAL_CAV_SRCH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient's oral cavity was searched for foreign objects after this procedure.

columns.name: CONSENTS_SIGNED_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the result of the "operative consents signed" question for a timeout.

columns.name: WEIGHT_REVIEWED_C_NAME
columns.description: Verify that the patient's weight has been reviewed prior to the procedure.

columns.name: LAST_VOID_REVD_C_NAME
columns.description: Verify that the time of the patient's last void (bathroom visit) has been reviewed prior to the procedure

columns.name: IMPROVMNT_OPP_REV_C_NAME
columns.description: Verify that opportunities for improvement (i.e. communication, patient interaction, case outcomes, etc) were reviewed prior to procedure

columns.name: PREOP_DIAG_REV_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the result of the "Pre-Operative Diagnosis Reviewed?" question for a timeout.

columns.name: PAT_SPEC_NEEDS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the result of the "Patient Special Needs Reviewed?" question for a timeout.

columns.name: PROC_SPEC_NEEDS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the result of the "Procedure Special Needs Reviewed?" question for a timeout.

columns.name: CORRECT_INSTRUMNT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the result of the "Correct Instruments?" question for a timeout.

columns.name: PAT_CLASS_REV_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the result of the "Patient Class Reviewed?" question for a timeout.

columns.name: POSTOP_DEST_REV_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the result of the "Post-op Destination Reviewed?" question for a timeout.

columns.name: SKIN_ASMT_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores if the skin assessment has been completed.

columns.name: ULC_PRV_ASMT_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores that the pressure ulcer prevention assessment has been completed.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO
columns.description: This is a free-text item for additional notes. It can use a note template to document necessary comments during a timeout.

columns.name: VTE_PROPHYLAX_ORD_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of whether a venous thromboembolism prophylaxis has been ordered prior to the start of a procedure.

columns.name: REV_POS_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of whether the positive outcomes were reviewed.

columns.name: PROT_ADHERED_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of whether the safe surgery checklist protocol was adhered to.

columns.name: PROT_ADHERED_COM
columns.description: The free text comments related to the whether the safe surgery checklist protocol was adhered to.

columns.name: CORRECT_ACCESS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the accessed vein/artery is the correct access.

columns.name: PAT_REEVALUATED_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the patient was re-evaluated immediately prior to sedation.

columns.name: PRIM_SURG_SCRUB_YN
columns.description: Whether or not the primary surgeon was scrubbed in during the timeout.

columns.name: VISUAL_VERBAL_VER_YN
columns.description: Whether or not visual and verbal verification was performed by the primary surgeon during the timeout.

columns.name: MATCH_RUN_VER_YN
columns.description: Whether or not the match run was verified during the timeout.

columns.name: SSN_9CH_OR_9FN_VER_YN
columns.description: Whether or not the Social Security Number (SSN), 9CH, or 9FN was verified during the timeout.

columns.name: ATTEST_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column indicates whether or not an attestation is active or deleted.

columns.name: POWI_REGISTRATION_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the post-op infection registration date.

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_OVD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: An override reason for the organ check-in.
entries: Incorrect label on box, OPO contacted
Incorrect organ laterality previously documented, coordinators contacted

columns.name: ORGAN_VERIFIED_FOR_RECPNT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the donor organ was verified to match the intended organ for the recipient.

columns.name: INTND_RECIP_UNIQ_IDNT_VERIF_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the unique identifier of the intended transplant recipient was verified during the pre-organ recovery verification. 'Y' indicates that the intended recipient's unique identifier had been marked as verified. 'N' and NULL indicate that the intended recipient's unique identifier was not marked as verified.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Select the type of vessel verification being performed.
entries: Deceased donor extra vessels recovered with an organ will be used in the transplantation of a different organ
Extra vessels will be used in the modification of a transplanted organ

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_DONOR_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Enter the ID of the vessel donor.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_DONOR_ABO_C_NAME
columns.description: Select the blood type of the vessel donor.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_RECIP_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Enter the ID of the vessel recipient.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_RECIP_ABO_C_NAME
columns.description: Select the blood type of the vessel recipient.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_ABO_COMPAT_YN
columns.description: Confirm that the vessel donor and recipient are blood type compatible or intended incompatible.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_14_DAYS_YN
columns.description: Confirm that the vessels are within 14 days of their recovery date.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_INFECT_TEST_YN
columns.description: Confirm that the vessel donor's infectious disease testing results have been verified.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_BEFORE_ANAST_YN
columns.description: Confirm that vessel verification was completed before vessel anastomosis start time.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the note template ID associated with an Anesthesia attestation.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.
